description:
### Almost Increasing Sequence

This problem requires you to determine if it is possible to obtain a strictly increasing sequence by removing no more than one element from the array.

Input: An array of integers.
Output: Returns true if it is possible to remove one element from the array in order to get a strictly increasing sequence, and false otherwise.

Example:

``` almostIncreasingSequence([1, 3, 2, 1]) // false ```
